project.name: BV Capital
project.description: BV Capital is an Internet focused early stage venture capital firm currently investing out of two Funds: BV Capital III in North America and eVenture I in Europe. Investing in Internet entrepreneurs for almost 15 years, BV Capital frequently is the first institutional investor in companies creating highly scalable services and significant value propositions for their users. Since 2008 Railslove is building internal applications for BV Capital.
